frequentCallForPapers.name: DevOps Porto
frequentCallForPapers.description: Building Bridges Between Development, Operations, Communities, Companies, People

sporadicCallForPapers.name: TECHinPORTO 2018
sporadicCallForPapers.description: TECHinPORTO was born in 2017 from Jumia's will to share and promote Porto's state of the art Information Technologies. By teaming up with great technology partners, we expect to bring the best from the tech community to our blooming city, learn together and deliver a kickass experience.
